text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Fortnite. The build quality of the Refurbished: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4210M, 8GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, GT 750M Graphics, Windows 10) Grade B is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the Intel Core i5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4210M, 8GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, GT 750M Graphics, Windows 10) Grade B!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4210M, 8GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, GT 750M Graphics, Windows 10) Grade B!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The Intel Core i5 in the Refurbished: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4210M, 8GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, GT 750M Graphics, Windows 10) Grade B is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i5. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Alienware 14 ALW14-1250sLV 14-Inch Gaming Laptop (i5-4210M, 8GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive, GT 750M Graphics, Windows 10) Grade B!
